class.name: Phaser.Physics.Ninja.AABB

parameters.name: body
parameters.help: The body that owns this shape.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The x coordinate to create this shape at.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The y coordinate to create this shape at.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: The width of this AABB.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: The height of this AABB.

class.help: Ninja Physics AABB constructor.\nNote: This class could be massively optimised and reduced in size. I leave that challenge up to you.

public.name: collideAABBVsAABB
public.help: Collides this AABB against a AABB.

parameters.name: aabb
parameters.help: The AABB to collide against.

public.name: collideAABBVsTile
public.help: Collides this AABB against a Tile.

parameters.name: tile
parameters.help: The Tile to collide against.

public.name: collideWorldBounds
public.help: Collides this AABB against the world bounds.

public.name: destroy
public.help: Destroys this AABB's reference to Body and System

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: Penetration depth on the x axis.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Penetration depth on the y axis.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.help: The AABB involved in the collision.

parameters.name: t
parameters.help: The Tile involved in the collision.

public.name: render
public.help: Render this AABB for debugging purposes.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: The context to render to.

parameters.name: xOffset
parameters.help: X offset from AABB's position to render at.

parameters.name: yOffset
parameters.help: Y offset from AABB's position to render at.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug shape to be rendered. (format is css color string).

parameters.name: filled
parameters.help: Render the shape as solid (true) or hollow (false).

public.name: reportCollisionVsBody
public.help: Process a body collision and apply the resulting forces. Still very much WIP and doesn't work fully. Feel free to fix!

parameters.name: px
parameters.help: The tangent velocity

parameters.name: py
parameters.help: The tangent velocity

parameters.name: dx
parameters.help: Collision normal

parameters.name: dy
parameters.help: Collision normal

parameters.name: obj
parameters.help: Object this AABB collided with

public.name: reportCollisionVsWorld
public.help: Process a world collision and apply the resulting forces.

parameters.name: px
parameters.help: The tangent velocity

parameters.name: py
parameters.help: The tangent velocity

parameters.name: dx
parameters.help: Collision normal

parameters.name: dy
parameters.help: Collision normal

parameters.name: obj
parameters.help: Object this AABB collided with

returns.help: True if the collision was processed, otherwise false.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: Penetration depth on the x axis.

parameters.name: y

parameters.help: The AABB involved in the collision.

parameters.name: tile
parameters.help: The Tile involved in the collision.

public.name: aabbTileProjections
public.inlineHelp: All of the collision response handlers.
